quote_first: When he woke up it was already night, and the moon was shining into the room. He looked at his watch: it was a
quote_last: . Sleep had left him; he sat down upon his bed and thought of the funeral of the old Countess.
title: The Queen of Spades
author: Alexsander S. Pushkin

quote_first: He glanced down at his watch. He had been smiling as he stroked her awake, and was smiling now. “
quote_last: . I sat in my stupid old motel room for almost two hours after we talked, trying to convince myself that what I was thinking couldn’t be true. Only I didn’t get where I am by dodging the truth.”
title: Full Dark, No Stars
author: Stephen King

quote_last: ., Ennet House, the hours that are truly wee.
title: Infinite Jest
author: David Foster Wallace
